messages.content: Explain the main focus of the ComfyUI-Loopchain extension.
The main focus of this extension is implementing a mechanism called loopchain.
How can you identify a loop chain in a workflow using this extension?
If a node chain contains a loop node from this extension, it will become a loop chain.
Where can you find an example of using the ComfyUI-Loopchain extension?
The provided workflow named `full_loopchain.json` showcases an example of using this extension.
How do you install the ComfyUI-Loopchain extension?
The installation link for the extension is provided: https://github.com/Fannovel16 vicissvel16 vicissvel16 KÃ¼n.
What type of images should be placed in the `heads` folder?
The `heads` folder should contain images to be used as loop variations.
List the nodes available in the ComfyUI-Loopchain extension.

The extension provides the following nodes: EmptyLatentImageLoop, ImageStorageImport, ImageStorageExport, ImageStorageExportLoop, ImageStorageImport, ImageStorageExportLoop, ImageStorageReset, FolderToImageStorage, LatentStorageImport, LatentStorageExportLoop, LatentStorageReset.
